# subviews

**Instance Property**

An array that contains the view’s subviews.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor @preconcurrency override dynamic var subviews: [UIView] { get }
```

## Overview

This property inherits from [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/UIKit/UIView].

## Accessing view features

- **layoutSubviews()**: Instructs the view’s subviews to position within the view.
- **encode(with:)**: Serializes the view to the specified coder.
- **traitCollectionDidChange(_:)**: Notifies the view when the device orientation changes.
